title: LOw priorty que
body: when ever I play a game on lol it shows the low priorty que thing and I wait it out multiple games this has happened does this continue? its getting annoying if its a bug plz fix

replies.body: It does kind of suck, but when you end up with a [**LPQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714) they typically last for anywhere from 5 games. A number of games can also change based on how often or how many times you've recently afk'd or left games. Once you've played through the required amount it'll be lifted.
